Package com.cytech.classeTestsUnitaires

Class TestGestionDemandeAdhesionBdd

java.lang.Object
com.cytech.classeTestsUnitaires.TestGestionDemandeAdhesionBdd
public class TestGestionDemandeAdhesionBdd extends Object
Test class for GestionDemandeAdhesionBdd functionality. This class contains unit tests for the membership request database management, including tests for database connection, email uniqueness verification, request insertion, and image retrieval.

  • Constructor Details

    • TestGestionDemandeAdhesionBdd

      public TestGestionDemandeAdhesionBdd()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to run all tests for GestionDemandeAdhesionBdd. Executes all test methods and displays a summary of results. Includes preparation and cleanup of test files.

    • testConstructeurEtConnexion

      public static void testConstructeurEtConnexion()
      Tests the constructor and database connection functionality. Verifies that an instance can be created and the connection can be closed properly.

    • testVerifierMailUnique

      public static void testVerifierMailUnique()
      Tests the email uniqueness verification functionality. Verifies that the system correctly identifies unique and non-unique email addresses, including edge cases like empty and null emails.

    • testInsertionDemandeBaseDonnes

      public static void testInsertionDemandeBaseDonnes()
      Tests the membership request insertion functionality. Verifies that a new membership request can be inserted into the database with all required information, including identity documents and photos.

    • testGetImagesParEmail

      public static void testGetImagesParEmail()
      Tests the image retrieval functionality. Verifies that images associated with a specific email can be retrieved from the database, including verification of image data integrity.

    • preparerFichiersTest

      public static void preparerFichiersTest()
      Prepares test files for the database tests. Creates temporary files for identity card and photo tests.

    • nettoyerFichiersTest

      public static void nettoyerFichiersTest()
      Cleans up test files after the tests are complete. Removes temporary files created for testing.

    • nettoyerDonneesTestBDD

      public static void nettoyerDonneesTestBDD()
      Cleans up test data from the database. Removes test records created during the tests.
